CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Herein , we present an easily obtainable selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) by replacing thiophenes with selenophene rings in the polymer backbone.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PCDTBT (Polyaniline derivate) |
| PCDSeBT (Poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole)) |
| selenophene analogue |
| poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) |
| thiophenes |
| selenophene rings |
| polymer backbone |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PCDSeBT (Poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole)) |
| selenophene rings |

The other entities in the paragraph do not refer to specific material names:

* Herein
* we present
* an easily obtainable selenophene analogue
* of PCDTBT
* by replacing
* thiophenes with selenophene rings
* in the polymer backbone.
